comments.content:
There are at least 4 fonts in your sample image. I hope you’re looking for the VAUGHN BODE font which seems to be Futura.  
“Vaughn Bode, geometric sans” would also have made a great title for your post.  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191959/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)

The headline is [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191959/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/futura_bold_ot_std/); the body is [Century Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191959/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/century-gothic/); the bold sans at the bottom is Arial.

Thanks a lot. Sorry for my bad description. I will pay more attention next time.

Jim

Sorry if I sounded a bit harsh.
